name: Apache Ness
description: '''Ernest Brown''', better known as '''The Apache Ness''', '''Apache Ness''' or '''Ness and The Sensationals''' ('''Ness y Los Sensacionales'''), is a Panamanian musician of [[Reggae en Espa√±ol]]. He was born in the province of Colon, Republic of Panama, to parents Claudia Brown and Brown Sr.
